mapper.select:
select ifnull(sum(V_MONEY),0) ORDER_MONEY,ifnull(sum(CASE WHEN V_PAY_TYPE = '01' THEN V_MONEY ELSE 0 end ),0) ORDER_ALI_MONEY, ifnull(sum(CASE WHEN V_PAY_TYPE = '02' THEN V_MONEY ELSE 0 end ),0) ORDER_WX_MONEY from t_order_tab
and to_days(V_CREATE_TIME) = to_days(now()) and (V_STATUS = '1' or V_STATUS='3')

SELECT ifnull(SUM(V_MONEY),0) COMMISSION_MONEY FROM t_commission_tab
and to_days(V_COMMISSION_TIME) = to_days(now()) and V_STATUS = '1'

SELECT ifnull(sum(V_TOTAL_COLLECTION),0) COUNT_MONEY, ifnull(sum(V_ALI_COLLECTION),0) ALI_MONEY, ifnull(sum(V_WX_COLLECTION),0) WX_MONEY FROM T_COLLECTION_TAB
and V_APP_ID = #{V_APP_ID}

SELECT ifnull(V_COUNT_RECEIVABLES,0) COUNT_MONEY, ifnull(V_ALI_RECEIVABLES,0) ALI_MONEY, ifnull(V_WX_RECEIVABLES,0) WX_MONEY, ifnull(V_SURPLUS_BOND,0) SURPLUS_BOND FROM t_bond_today tbt
and tbt.V_USER_ID = #{V_USER_ID}
